title: Raúl Salas Reyes
text:
I am a PhD candidate in Environmental Science at the Department of Physical and Environmental Sciences at the University of Toronto Scarborough. My research interests are in climate governance, climate policy, and environmental social norms.
At UTSC I work with Dr. Nicole Klenk at the Environmental Science in Society Lab and Dr. William Gough at the Climate Lab.




PhD in Environmental Science | University of Toronto Scarborough | Expected 2023


Master of Environmental Science | University of Toronto Scarborough | 2014


Master in Renewable Energy | Universidad Autonoma de Guadalajara | 2010


BASc in Industrial Engineering | Universidad Autonoma de Guadalajara | 2008
